name: places/ChIJabbm0FlZwokRmJdj52LiBFg
formattedAddress: 1590 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1590 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
I booked a service through classpass for today for 6pm. I showed up at 545pm as required and the store was completely closed. I stayed until about 6:20. And still nothing and no one showed up. I was told by a neighbor that sometimes the aesthetician opens late. So I waited a bit longer and still... nothing.

You can't even call the official number online or on Google maps because it goes straight to voice mail.

originalText.text:
I LOVE coming here! ðŸ’– Iâ€™m very new to eyelash extensions and my first time here, I was made to feel super comfortable. The different kind of lash extension options were explained to me in detail, and during the appointment I was told what was happening every step of the way. The end result of my first appointment is why Iâ€™m a dedicated customer!
I get so many compliments on my look and the lashes last!

I also get my eyebrows done here as well. I was a threading enthusiast but have since been converted to brow waxing and will only be getting my brows waxed here. Book your appointment here today!

originalText.text: Needs a few lessons on professionalism. I booked an appointment via StyleSeat and received an email confirmation with a tech's name that I had not be given the option to select. I inquired  about this by text to ensure I'd be serviced by specific person (Scarlet) --- based on reviews, she seems to be the tech who comes highly recommenced and that's who I intended to be serviced by as a first time client. Instead of making accommodations and confirming that she'd be able to adjust my appointment, I was asked to forward my confirmation email (which I did). After forwarding the email, i expected to receive a follow up text or email confirming that Scarlet would be my tech OR that my appointment time would be adjusted to align with her schedule. Instead, I receive an email 2 days later saying that my appointment had been canceled --- no follow up, no direct email or text messages. So, if their services are anything like the unprofessionalism, I dodged a bullet!

originalText.text: I rarely leave reviews. This was my first time visiting this business.  I came in for Lashes and let me tell you.... I got red carpet service. My tech Scarlet was so professional. She educated me with a lot. Simply great experience. Will be a loyal customer going fwd.

originalText.text:
Scarlet transformed my eyebrows after I messed up their shape by tweezing them myself. She described exactly what she was going to do to my brows before starting and really took her time to wax and tweeze them.

Also, the location is super accessible and the salon itself is very chic.
